scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts a group of men gathered around a stone sarcophagus, into which a young boy, dressed in a golden robe, is being lowered. Two older men, one in blue and the other in pink, are actively assisting in the process, holding the boy. Other men stand by, observing the event. Above them, a stylized representation of the heavens is shown with golden rays emanating from a blue sky dotted with clouds, falling upon a patterned background of red and blue squares. The ground is rendered as green grass.
